title: Lawyer Man (1932) &ndash; William Powell
description:
Format: AVI
Language: English
Runtime: 68 mins
Resolution: 640 x 480
Overall Bit rate: 2186 Kbps
Audio Codec: MP3


Idealistic attorney Anton Adam makes headlines when he successfully prosecutes a prominent New York racketeer named Gilmurry. Adam's sudden renown attracts the attention of high-profile legal eagle Granville Bentley, who asks Adam to become a partner in his law firm. But Adam's rising career takes a nosedive when he's framed by Gilmurry in a trumped-up breach of promise suit. He is licked and a washout but he will show them and come up in the world again.


LAWYER MAN, Writers Rian James, James Seymour and Max Trell; directed by William Dieterle and released by WB, Vitaphone.


Starring: William Powell, Joan Blondell, David Landau, Helen Vinson, Claire Dodd, Alan Dinehart, Allen Jenkins.
